description: Check for Sufficient Certificate Auto-Renewal Period
rationale: Having the right number of days before expiration set to trigger auto-renewal for your Azure Key Vault SSL certificates, will enforce your certificate renewal strategy to follow the best practices as specified in the compliance regulations implemented within your organization. Setting a longer period of time before certificate expiration will allow you to mitigate efficiently any issues that your auto-renewal process may encounter such as an invalid or expired Certificate Authority (CA).
